website_summaries.verdict: A sizable greenhouse (10' x 20' x 8') with a peaked roof design that is excellent for starting seeds and extending the growing season.
pros: This model features ShelterLock technology to help add stability and durability to the unit
The translucent cover is treated to diffuse light and reduce scorching while the roll-up side panels and vents allow airflow
cons: Not a con, just remember, this is the structure only, it doesn't include the shelving

customer_reviews.title: Good Functionality and Durability
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was a bit slower than the manual outlined but overall doable with two people. We have had it up for nearly 1 year and there is no visible wear or tear. It's withstood heavy rains and wind and looks as good as the day we bought it. If you're looking to get into doing the greenhouse thing but aren't 100% sure if you're ready to commit to something permanent this is thr structure for you!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife 4-5 years ago. And it is still going strong. We take it down every fall and put it up every spring so the snow doesn't tear it up. Over all this thing is great. Does the job, heats up well, vents well, and plenty of room. The picture is late fall with it over our pepper plants to finish the year. Keeps the plants warm in 40 degree temps. Then its off for storage for the winter. Great product and i would happily recommend you get one. Given its taken care of...
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for price.
customer_reviews.text: Dislikes: manual, no extra bars to weight down flaps. Make sure you have an extra hand and a step-ladder. The box says that it takes 2 hours for assembly; that is a stretch unless you have a 4-man team of 8 foot tall mechanical engineers on amphetamines. The assembly isn't bad if there isn't a medium breeze, but it did take me longer than two hours and I have assembled them before. It seems to be well made with decent materials. I bought this one because of the two others I helped assemble and knew they were pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Like the greenhouse... Hated the instructions
customer_reviews.text: As said in other reviews, the instructions are horrible. Other than putting it together, I really like it. Time will tell how it holds up. Did I mention the instructions are horrible! If someone at Shelterlogic would create better instructions or better yet a 3 minute step by step video, assembly would take much less time. I gave it four stars because I think it's a good product. Had the instructions been better it might have been 5 stars. For some reason they don't include pipe for the bottom of the two end sections. I added pipe to add weight, to hold the end sections down when it's windy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, but read and closely follow the instructions carefully!
customer_reviews.text: Takes awhile to assemble yourself. Plan on most of the day to veriy parts, READ OVER INSTRUCTUONS (very important), and put it up. Be sure to wind tie down and anchor all the outside corners. You will need to buy parachord and ling tent stakes. This kept my green hpuse up through a early blizzard blast. I also fastened the back ground flap to a 6 by 6 I had laying around. Bought 5 foot long 1 1/2 inch steel pipe and inserted them into thenside and front ground flap pockets. It does diffuse incoming light a little, since it is a thicker rip resistant material. Worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dziak

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and design
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted to get one, so finally did in summer of 2019. We missed the early spring, but was able to plant peppers and tomatoes in it. They did great. We felt it needed extra support bars with our heavy snow, so we called company up and order the additional bars. they assembled great, but I think they were alittle pricey for what you got. I think the only thing we will have to watch out for are the zippers. the back window doesnt go up and down very well and if they breaks there are not string ties to close up the window.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Wadzinski

customer_reviews.title: My Plants are Toasty Warm
customer_reviews.text: Other than a lot of #@#$% regarding the directions; it has been everything it advertised. I live in the High Dessert but it gets cold at night; not my tomatoes....they are toasty warm. I really love it. We put pavers in and dressed it up a little. Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Works well after modifications
customer_reviews.text: To weigh it down against the wind and to correct for non level ground, I mounted it on top of raised bed made with 4x4 pressurized lumber. Sewed extra foot of canvas at bottom and around door to control draft.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Ho

customer_reviews.title: Not quite the best design, but a good deal
customer_reviews.text: This little greenhouse is the most complicated thing to put together!!!! They could color code the piece instead of the hard to read little numbers, and also this model only has a zip up door on one end... I tried to order another one but they won't sell it apart from the entire cover kit. The sides only roll up a tiny bit, too you can't tell from the picture, I thought the sides would roll up at least halfway, allowing for better air circulation. I wish I'd bought the 12 x 20, it has two zippered doors.... I wouldn't recommend this model. The customer service woman was exceptionally helpful but still couldn't sell me another end piece....
customer_reviews.author: Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: It’s a NO from me
customer_reviews.text: Just don’t. I’ve had this a year, and I wish I’d never bought it. It’s so flimsy. If you actually want to grow things in your greenhouse, save your money and don’t buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Tearing in just over a year!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this greenhouse 1 year and 3 months ago. The frame is very nice, but the large cover has already began to develop tears where it rubs against the corners of the metal supports. The warranty for this green house is 1 year. So they quality just isn't there.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Verify parts ASAP-missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: While I like the product and would purchase it again, I would recommend the following: Sort your pieces out to ensure you have everything before you start. We waited for good weather to open the box and we were excited to start. Found we are missing a few side flanges and almost 30 nuts. How can we get the missing pieces? We are currently held together with zip ties! It’s like the part numbers were for smaller kit!
customer_reviews.author: Allison L

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy plastic! One complaint
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived damaged! But all parts were there. Not hard to assemble. Hubby and I had it up in a couple of hours. Sturdy plastic! One complaint: ALL of the bolts were in one bag together. There are three sizes, all very similar in length. That took 20 mins just to sort them.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Needs better part packaging
customer_reviews.text: Took 30 minutes to sort the slightly different sized bolts that were all in one bag. Very easy after that. Should have bagged the different pieces in separate bags. Quality and ease of build after sorting was fine.
customer_reviews.author: mike davidson

customer_reviews.title: I like the product but was told some box damage
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but was told some box damage, there was severe box damage and loss of parts Amazon told me to get in touch with the manufacturer. The manufacturer stated that I bought it through Amazon and they should deal with it. It took me almost three weeks before I finally got my green house up and the manufacturer provided me with the missing parts and I am happy with the manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Takes more than 2 hours to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was.... intense lots of parts but came together nicely. You can find the build on YouTube @lifewiththefultons
customer_reviews.author: Fna

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: My main issue with this buy was the delivery carrier who lost a bag of hinges that were crucial to putting this thing together. It does take multiple people and multiple hours to put together. It also really kind of misleads you to believe that the sides roll up all the way . It does not! Only eight inches off the ground which basically made it useless to me. So I had to make some improvised adjustments. Ehhh I would have bought something else .
customer_reviews.author: MariaC123

customer_reviews.title: A Good Starter
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done, but cannot withstand any serious wind. Easy to assemble and stake. Some of the spots where the tarp can meet friction need to be smoothed over or rips can occur. To be fair, I have it in the middle of one of the largest wind farms in North America, so I assumed its shelf life would be short. Burying the corners and sides a foot or so below ground would help, but also nullify the side flaps. The plants loved it. Keeps them from freezing even when its in the teens and blowing. The tarp seems almost too thick, but nevertheless the good sun gets into those plants. Its a good introduction to greenhouse growing.
customer_reviews.author: Frisky Rick James

customer_reviews.title: We love the green house
customer_reviews.text: We love the green house. It was delivered on time and was just as described. I put it together in about 1 1/2 hours. I bought extra anchors due to the heavy rain and wind we get. It has been through two rain storms and 35 mph winds with no problems. I would recommend this green house.
customer_reviews.author: rondog

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: works like a charm. sturdy. even have space to store outdoor stuff i.e. chairs, table hammock. worth the price
customer_reviews.author: dogmommy

customer_reviews.title: Great Greenhouse!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this Greenhouse a couple months ago. It took my husband and I about a day to put it up. We thought it to be very easy. We have had several storms with very strong winds and have been very impressed with how it with stood this! We would definitely buy another one if we needed too!
customer_reviews.author: Katie W.

customer_reviews.title: Took longer than two hours! LOL!
customer_reviews.text: Do not believe the "two hour set up" time and you will be fine! Took my husband and brother-in-law the better part of a day, but it is up and doing a good job!
customer_reviews.author: AmmaJ

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It's been just a little over a year since I set up my greenhouse. Although I loved it at first, the material just doesn't stand up to California weather. The top has already completely torn where the support frames are. I am very disappointed. I won't purchase Shelter Logic products again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris V

customer_reviews.title: this is not a functioning greenhouse
customer_reviews.text: low price.... just dont buy this. plastic lasts a year. not strong enough for wind or snow. too much shade inside to use as greenhouse. frames are too far apart.
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: Great way to grow veggies.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, except for the zipper on the door. But if you want your veggies to grow like weeds, get a greenhouse.
customer_reviews.author: peggysue

customer_reviews.title: I have had it up for 2 weeks and 2 days and it is already a wreck
customer_reviews.text: When we got it put up I had a lot of confidence in this. We followed all the installation instructions and even bought extra stakes and put them in. It did not last through high winds, we haven't had wind over 20mph and it is bent, came loose, and not sturdy. After two weeks it is basically trash.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Welliver

customer_reviews.title: second purchase. bought it for a friend. This ...
customer_reviews.text: second purchase. bought it for a friend. This greenhouse is large roomy and can be well ventilated with window, door and rolling up the side.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine S.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good price for the quality. Took about 6 hours to put up. But keeps our plants from freezing. Instructions are clear. Easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the rest is good made! I like it
customer_reviews.text: Need to trim down 9 inches to clear the beams .... the rest is good made! I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Packaging was all ripped up when arrived worried parts were missing.
customer_reviews.author: DemiGorgan

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: So far, I am satisfied with this product with one exception. The zipper on the front is missing the zipper pull; this makes entering the greenhouse very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Phaedra Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed'''''''''''
customer_reviews.text: This was awful to try to put together'''' The paper work did not have all of the directions. What directions that were there were not that helpful. I will never promote this to anyone EVER
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Star

customer_reviews.title: Packaged well, shipped quickly, works as described. ...
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well, shipped quickly, works as described. Might have to get a larger one as she managed to fill it in completely. Year one/Season One a complete success.
customer_reviews.author: David Q.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Box came beat to hell and back by UPS, luckily only a few screws and bolts missing so once those were purchased everything went great.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Kucera

customer_reviews.title: But it went up easily, and works well
customer_reviews.text: It was missing a couple of parts, so beware. But it went up easily, and works well. I am on my second year of using it and it has held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: ME Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Box damaged and bag containg nuts and bolts was open.Misiing nuts and bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Some of the poles were slightly bent. Purchased 4 and each one is a slightly different heights put two tops and sides up and don’t fit too well on one being different siZes
customer_reviews.author: Kim paton

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Shouldn't ever be missing parts from a complete box. Other than that it looks ok. Plastic cover looks like it will last a year maybe. However. Still missing tclamp and endclamp connectors to finish assembly. I'll get something figured out from hardware store tomorrow but fairly ridiculous and costing me time
customer_reviews.author: Jason Dunk

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price. a couple suggestions.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is a very good greenhouse. The things I would change is there should be side windows/vents and or the side roll ups should be able to roll up much higher for better air flow.
customer_reviews.author: L Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I thought, for the price this is a great little greenhouse. Served it purpose and then some.
customer_reviews.author: jjoplin

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth it
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a pain to put together and the first windstorm hit us and one side completely collapsed. Really a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no shelving
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was supposed to come with shelving and it did not.
customer_reviews.author: Connie M.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not very wind resistance it was picked up and carried away 2x next greenhouse will be glass
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived without a few of the main support poles but Melissa in customer service got them out immediately. As to the greenhouse! It is all I could have asked for! Perfect and with the added augers I have a great greenhouse to feed me for years to come. Great Product and great customer support!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Tims

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good product. Has stood up to some good wind gusts with no problem. Definitely takes two people to assemble. But once adjusted correctly works well. Will probably only last a year or two thought
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Had it up two weeks before a wind storm destroyed it
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: fabric rots fast in thew sun... I thought this was made for that?
customer_reviews.text: about a year old now and the tent is already ripping. Not a good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Good frame Bad cover
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted one summer season. Not for any wind area above 35-40 mph Very poor cover material
customer_reviews.author: Aaron H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Took much longer to put together than ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Took much longer to put together than it suggested. Need a few words in the instructions to clarify. We got it done!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: It takes some time to put together. Assembly time was probably 5-6 hours for 1 person then 15 minutes help from somebody else. Very high quality though. I was really pleased by the finished product.
customer_reviews.author: whipper

customer_reviews.title: Here is how my box arrived. Nightmare. Screws ...
customer_reviews.text: Here is how my box arrived. Nightmare. Screws were falling out of box. Haven't done a complete inventory on it yet. Hope everything is there.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron W. Rustemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Many parts were missing! Had to do my own adjustment to make it work. Too much money for what we got. 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: James Blada

customer_reviews.title: Not a high quality product
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have all the right parts and not easy to assemble, wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I get veggies two to three weeks earlier. Wish it at a door at each end.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph D. Sargent

customer_reviews.title: ... is exactly what I needed and the price was great.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: One person (over 6' can lift 80 lbs.) can assemble this. It will take 4 mornings (too hot mid day in GA). First day inside putting together all the frame parts to the point where they can fit out the door. Day 2 frame ribs. 3 plastic, 4 augers and ventilation. Sides do not press to 8" they are tight at 12". We will see how long before a tree limb takes it all out. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as easy to set up as "advertised"
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as easy to set up as "advertised", but with the addition of 30" auger stakes, it is solidly in the ground and has easily surviced 60+ mph winds to date.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kaeppel

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a five star but it is a bit wobbly. As a result I purchased some cable and turnbuckles to add cross bracing the the sides. It is now rock solid. The next step up from this to another greenhouse is massively expensive, so I think this is a great value for the money. As others have said lay out all the parts to keep track of what parts are what. The instructions are not the best but if you can build lego's you can build this. I am happy with the quality and construction. It helps to have a helper and a step ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Love the
customer_reviews.text: this is almost up, we had to stop due to weather but so far, very excited! Love the size
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Thing is awesome, one part was wrong but nothing a hacksaw ...
customer_reviews.text: Thing is awesome , one part was wrong but nothing a hacksaw and drill couldn't fix, love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP FABRIC MATERIAL = TEARS IMMEDIATELY AFTER WARRANTY IS OVER
customer_reviews.text: After having my greenhouse in So. California weather (no snow) for 17 months, the material is starting to tear. Guess the Warranty stops at a year...So BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Goddard

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to fabricate some parts that were not drilled and damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Brock

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: While the greenhouse is of excellent quality there were a few problems . My kit was missing a piece and after sending the PART NUMBER to them they kept asking for a description ! Which would be difficult to give since all the of the parts look alike , except in length . I made my own replacement part for the greenhouse which has worked fairly well .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is better than I imagined!!
customer_reviews.text: Just came in. Shipping was incredibly fast!The box was in immaculate condition. Not a scratch on anything in it! It even came with bonus ground anchors!! Can't wait to get it built and get plants in it!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Flowers

customer_reviews.title: love the greenhouse
customer_reviews.text: love the greenhouse, the only issue I had was that the tape had broken holding the box together and the bolts and nuts were falling out of the box and the different size bolts were all mixed together in the same bag. also the instructions when putting it together needs to start from the back to the front not getting all of the frame put together and then it tells you that the door pieces need to slide through the frame. that should have gone first.
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: When it's put together it works great. The problem with it was that numbers on parts are hard to read and they all look the same.
customer_reviews.author: bill graves

customer_reviews.title: ... have high wind here in CA and it looks like it is going to blow away
customer_reviews.text: I have high wind here in CA and it looks like it is going to blow away. It has already been six month since I got it and it looks like it is not going to last longer even with the anchors. Remember they don't provide all the parts (horizontal tubes). I don't know why. So you have to come up with your own solution to hold the tubes down. and the material tiers up in few month. Not good for CA winter at all.
customer_reviews.author: coffeem

customer_reviews.title: this green house is one of the best i have seen for the cost and is very ...
customer_reviews.text: this green house is one of the best i have seen for the cost and is very sturdy with thick metal poles bolted construction comes with high grade anchors...If amazon can get there head out of there ass and get this product to you with all the pieces without taping the box up i believe it will work for moat applications... im a chameleon breeder with no intentions of growing anything in this greenhouse
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A. Suggs

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: My brother recently purchased this same greenhouse in a 10 x 20. After helping him set it up I decided to purchase one. It is very sturdy with a heavy duty frame. We both purchased heavy duty anchors to add to the ones included. It was delivered very fast and all parts were accounted for with a few extra screws. I will be using it for a hydroponics greenhouse and I know I will not have to worry about my plants. This greenhouse is well worth the money. I will be purchasing another one. I highly recommend this company and their product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dye

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this Greenhouse,it's strong and solid. We need to find some type of shelving
customer_reviews.author: ray hays

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't receive any hardware for 2 of the 4 tents that I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this. The worst greenhouse ever designed. Overpriced pile of junk
customer_reviews.text: I would never buy this again. This is the worst design imaginable. Im a contractor and it was a pain in the ass to assemble. Is total crap. Im still in awe that this was designed the way it was. Please save yourself the money and time and do not buy this greenhouse. I would give zero stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Derek R

product_meta.title: ShelterLogic 10' x 20' GrowIT Greenhouse-in-a-Box Flow Peak Roof Style Easy Access Outdoor Grow House with Translucent Waterproof Cover
product_meta.description: Size:10' x 20'The ShelterLogic 10’ x 20’ GrowIT Greenhouse-in-a-Box with Easy Flow Vents is ready to build right out of the box. This easy access greenhouse delivers quality construction, easy assembly, and best-in-class value. Constructed from a 1-3/8” tubular high-grade steel frame, the greenhouse provides protection and a natural light source to your plants, herbs, and flowers. The steel frame has a premium powder coat protective finish to help resist chipping, peeling, rust, and corrosion. ShelterLock steel stabilizers add strength and stability to your greenhouse frame for a more durable plant shelter. Made from ClearView, a triple-layer heat bonded ripstop fabric, the cover is 5. 5 oz thick, waterproof, and has been UV-treated inside and out. The translucent greenhouse cover provides enhanced illumination, which is ideal for plant growth and protection. The Easy Flow roll-up side panels provide your plants with maximum airflow and temperature control. The included bungee cord fasteners hold the sides open while the hook and loop fasteners keep the sides down. With the Easy Slide Cross Rail tensioning system, the cover is locked down for a snug fit and squares up the frame, while Ratchet-Tite tensioning provides solid cover anchoring to the frame. The double-zippered front door allows walk-in access and can be rolled up and secured to your preferred height. The front door and back rear panel both have vents to keep air circulating. The greenhouse can be assembled in about 2 hours with 2 people. When your growing demands change, this portable greenhouse can be disassembled and transported easily. 15” auger anchors are included with your greenhouse kit for easy anchoring. ASSEMBLED DIMENSIONS: 10' L x 20' W x 8' HDOOR OPENING: 40” WDOOR ENTRANCE: 82” HINCLUDES: (1) Steel frame(1) Translucent cover(1) Double zippered front door with vent(1) Rear panel with ventBungee cords15” auger anchors(8) Ratchet tie-downsHardware kitEasy step-by-step instructions
feature_bullets: READY TO GROW BACKYARD GREENHOUSE: 10' x 20' x 8' peak roof design for growing plants, starting seeds and extending growing seasons
SHELTERLOCK: Patented metal ShelterLock 3X stabilizers ensure rock solid stability, delivering a stable, more durable shelter

UV PROTECTION: Translucent cover is UV-treated and allows a significant amount of diffused light to reach the plants. Diffused light reduces shadows and scorching to provide consistent lighting for all exposed parts of the plant
CLEARVIEW: Cover features, ClearView, and provides enhanced illumination designed specifically for plant growth and protection
EASYFLOW SIDE PANELS: Roll-up side panels and half moon screen vents at each end provide optimal airflow and temperature control.Rib Tubing Diameter:1.34 inch

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars202 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
